page.title: 05LANGUAGE
page.content: IN PART OF {REDDITCH}WE HAVE A NUMBER OF FAMILES WHO COME, ORIGINALLY FROM A DIFFERENT COUNTRY.A QUARTER OF THE CHILDREN IN OUR SCHOOL"{HOLYOAKES {FIELD FIRST SCHOOL}"SPEAK URDU AS THEIR FIRST LANGUAGE.URDU IS ONE OF THE LANGUAGES OF PAKISTAN.SOME OF OUR CHILDRENS PARENTS WERE BORN IN PAKISTAN,A FEW OF OUR CHILDREN WERE BORN THERE.MANY PARENTS CAN SPEAK A LITTLE OF OTHER LANGUAGES,ALTHOUGH ONLY A FEW PARENTS CAN SPEAK THEM FLUENTLY.THE MOST POPULAR SECOND LANGUAGE IS{FRENCH.}OUR MIDLAND { {DIALECT}IS DIFFERENT TO SOME PARTS OF THE COUNTRY WE SOMETIMES ACCIDENTALLY PRONOUNCE OUR LLs AS KKs WE SAY BOKKLE NOT BOTTLE.
